note.p: Career: In HEIC medical establishment, Bengal (before 1801)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1838 No 35 p 95
Notes: In PL until Nov 1837-Nov 1838. John Hunter's signature is on the certificate, but has been crossed out
References: R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 1. 1731-1847' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 307-332
